features: 3 in 1 Multi Function--Toddler playard for more room to play or sleep,full-size infant bassinet,and diaper changer for quick and easy diaper changes.
Easy to assemble--Beware of operation order!Firstly pull up four sides,secondly press down the bottom of the playpen
Easy to fold--Beware of operation order! Firstly pull up the drawstring of the bottom,secondly pull down the four sides of the playpen.
For Baby’s Safety-- Breathable mesh around the playard provides an easy-to-reach and easy-to-view spot.wheels with brakes for baby’s safety.
Portable Carrying Bag--Convenient for parents to carry, your little one can also sleep and play in a familiar and comfortable playpens at anytime and anywhere

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We do belive that happiness is contagious. And happy, healthy parents produce happy, healthy children.

Toddler Playard Max.33LB-Toddler playard for more room to play or sleep Infant Bassinet Max.25 LB-Infant bassinet for comfortable sleep for your littler one. Diaper Changer Max.25LB-Diaper changer for quick and easy diaper changes

Accompany with the growth of your little one Suitable for All Stage of Your Little One 0-6 Newborn--Practice your baby holding his head up and turning over 6-12 Infant--Practice your baby sitting and standing 12-18 Tollder--Your baby start to walk 18-33 Baby--More room for sleeping and playing Toddler Playard For play and dream This play yard has breathable mesh for you to keep an eye on your baby and provide a steady flow of air for your baby Infant Bassinet For better sleeping Bought this as a second bed for a second home of course. The bag and all other extras was just perfect as well Diaper Changer For easy and quick diaper chang Bought this for our 4th baby since our old one has seen better days. Right now she's 8wks old and I've basically been using it as more of a changing station in our bedroom since she sleeps with me, has a crib in her big sister's room, and a cradle in her nursery.

Portable everywhere Convenient for parents to carry, your baby can stay cozy and entertained no matter where you are! How to assemble? Firstly pull up four sides,secondly press down the bottom of the playpen Please fold and assemble the playpen correctly! How to fold? Firstly pull up the drawstring of the bottom,secondly pull down the four sides of the playpen Partition storage bag and Wheels with Brakes Large Storage Spaces-To keep baby's essentials more neat and orderly Move Around-Easy to move everywhere,and two wheels with brakes to ensure baby's safety

Customer Says-Baby in 0-6 month The playard is also really easy to set up and use. It's foldable, which makes it easy to store when not in use, and the wheels make it easy to move around the room. The mattress is also really comfortable, which is great for babies and toddlers.

Specifications of the Playard Product Weight 26.7 LB Open Size 39.4*27.6*27.6 Folded Size 28*13*9 IN Mattress Size 38.6*24.4 IN Diaper Table Size 27.6*15.7 IN Use Age Weight Newborn to 36 Months.Up to 33 LB Material Iron + Oxford Package Inhalt 1 *Infant Bassinet Package Inhalt 2 Toddler Playard Package Inhalt 3 Changing Table Package Inhalt 4 Foldable Mattress Package Inhalt 5 Storage Shelf Package Inhalt 6 Carrying Bag Package Inhalt 7 Toy Bar with 3 Cute Toys

What do it all come with ? Everything in the picture is what you get! Changing table, side storage pockets, over the top toys, the pad and raised sleep area and the whole play pin. The picture is not a lie and it’s true to the product you get. Mine isn't snapping open. Does anyone know what I'm doing wrong? Instructions say to open and it should just snap locked It seems that you have encountered a problem when the product is folded. Our product comes with a manual. Now we provide you with a video of the product folding steps, please refer to What’s the weight limit for the bottom (not the bassinet part)? 33 pounds Is it ok to use for newborns? Absolutely, the little attachments help parents. As the baby grows it adjust to help parents with their little one. Well worth the money. Does it fold up easily? Yes. When setting up, lock the 4 sides 1st. Then push the bottom down into place to complete set up. When folding up, pull the bottom up by the loop 1st. Then break down the sides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for grandbaby!
reviews.reviewText: As advertised. Cute and convenient. This was easy to put together. It works great when my grandson visits. Has convenient pockets for diapers. We just leave it up all the time, but it's easy to fold away. The changing table is hard to snap on, but I don't want it to fall off - so that's okay. Eventually, when we make it into a play pen that piece will be removed. We will just leave the changing table attached until he can roll over or starts pulling up. I left the instruction paper on the playpen floor so you can see the bottom level. Great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I haven’t had to use it yet. I have to say it took me a bit to figure out how to put together. After I did mine I did another for my daughter and now I’m a master. I was able to break it down and store easily. The design is awesome and very well made. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together and break down.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for our 4th baby since our old one has seen better days. Right now she's 8wks old and I've basically been using it as more of a changing station in our bedroom since she sleeps with me, has a crib in her big sister's room, and a cradle in her nursery.So currently it's sitting in the corner with all attachments on it, and I keep her diapers, wipes, clothes, bows, towels, blankets etc inside.I don't have any complaints with this one. It was easy to put together, it comes apart and breaks down easily, it rolls perfectly (our old one never rolled right), and on top of that it has a cute pattern around the top that's not overly childish amd annoying to look at every day.The price is great too. I mean this is the price you'll typically pay for a playpen with zero attachments. Other models we looked at that were similar to this one were $150+
